mapper.update: update user set sessionKey = #{sessionId}, sessionLimit = #{next} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, password, auth, sessionkey, sessionlimit, section_fullcode from user where sessionKey = #{value} and sessionlimit > now()
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, password, name, auth, section_fullcode) values (#{id},#{password},#{name},#{auth},#{section_fullcode})
